product_description: Tie-dye brings on-trend style to a comfy-casual jumpsuit designed with a drawstring at the waist and banded cuffs.
product_details_and_care:
Tie-dye brings on-trend style to a comfy-casual jumpsuit designed with a drawstring at the waist and banded cuffs.
52 1/2" length; 27" inseam; 10 1/2" leg opening (size Medium)
Front button-and-loop closure
V-neck
Fixed hood
Sleeveless
Front slant pockets
Elastic waist with faux tie
95% rayon, 5% spandex
Hand wash, dry flat
Made in the US
Dresses
Item #6052484
product_size_info:
True to size.
S=2-4, M=6-8, L=10.
